welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kings Mountain, the charming city known for its rich history and beautiful scenery! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves as the primary hub for all major airlines and houses a variety of restaurants and shops for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport is home to several airlines, including American Airlines, and offers amenities such as lounges and duty-free shopping.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves as a secondary hub for American Airlines and features a variety of dining options and retail stores.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and offers a variety of amenities, including a USO lounge for military personnel.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
